name: Persuasion and Influence
description: Techniques for controlling narratives and influencing decision-making in intelligence operations.

cards.title: Framing Effect & Narrative Control
cards.description: Shaping how information is presented to influence decision-making.
bulletpoints: Use selective language to guide perception
Implement contrast principles to control emotional responses
Apply cognitive biases to reinforce desired conclusions
cards.summaryText: Reframe narratives with tailored language, contrast hooks, and bias triggers to steer choices.

cards.title: Trust Exploitation and Rapport Building
cards.description: Establishing trust with targets to manipulate behaviors and gain intelligence.
bulletpoints: Use progressive disclosure to deepen trust over time
Control body language and vocal tonality to reinforce credibility
cards.summaryText: Mirror vulnerabilities, release information gradually, and manage tone and posture to convert trust into leverage.
